item.description:
Tomorrow is Champions of Champions a trivia night at the Middle East Corner, in Central Square Cambridge MA.

The quiz is more like a live game show including trivia, timed puzzles, feats of strength (Think “Dicecapades” or “Cranium.”)

Take a look at our recent review in the Boston Phoenix: http://events.thephoenix.com/boston/events/168659-champion-of-champions-pub-trivia/

The quiz is Every 1st wednesday at the Middle East Corner, in Central Square.
item.name: Champions of Champions!
